job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtModis is currently looking for a Data Scientist for a exciting opportunity in Michigan remote to start This will be working in a fast paced enterprise environment working with large data sets and doing heavy modeling The ideal candidate would have of 3 years of data science ltspangtexperience have worked with customer insight analytics and has worked on new model development utilizing Python and R  ltspangt ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtPOSITION DESCRIPTIONltstronggtampnbspltpgtltulgtltligtBuild largescale machinelearning modelspipelinesltligtltligtMaintain and enhance operational models through their lifecycle ltligtltligtDeveloping metrics and reports to monitor model accuracy and evaluate performanceltligtltligtltspangtTranslate complex quantitative analysis into business insightsltspangtltligtltligtCollect data perform statistical analysis and present solutions to Product Ownersbusiness customers ltligtltligtWorks hands on with tools such as Python R and SQLltligtltligtDefine and create the next generation of data solutionsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtTECHNICAL SKILLS DESIREDltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt3  5 years of Data Science experienceampnbspltligtltligtPredictive ModellingltligtltligtStatistical analysisltligtltligtPythonltligtltligtRltligtltligtSQLltligtltligtBachelors degree in mathematics data science statistics or computer scienceltligtltligtExperience with GCP is a plusltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtADDITIONAL INFORMATIONltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtExcellent compensation packages including Subsidized Medical Benefits Paid Time Off and 401kltligtltligtNo ThirdParty inquiriesltligtltligtThis role can be remote to start  but will eventually need to be onsite in Michiganltligtltulgt
